甕.definition: pottery container for water, wine etc

甕中之鱉.definition: lit. like a turtle in a jar; to be trapped (idiom)

甕中捉鱉.definition: lit. to catch a turtle in a jar (idiom); fig. to go after easy prey

甕城.definition: enceinte of a city gate; barbican entrance to a city

甕安.definition: Wengan county in Qiannan Buyei and Miao autonomous prefecture 黔南州[Qian2 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou

甕安縣.definition: Wengan county in Qiannan Buyei and Miao autonomous prefecture 黔南州[Qian2 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou

甕聲甕氣.definition: to speak in a low muffled voice (idiom)
